DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety repeat dos Botulinum Toxin Type A treatment focal upper limb poststroke spasticity
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Botulinum Toxin Type A Treatment Focal Upper Limb Poststroke Spasticity
DOC.criteria: Medically stable poststroke patient spastic muscle upper limb Stroke within 6 month study enrollment Previous therapy Botulinum Toxin Type A treatment condition prior 4 month enrollment , treatment condition prior 01 January 1998
